about.aboutContent:
UPDATES


November 2021 release includes WFRC/MAG forecasts using the v8.3.2 TDM. Other areas were last updated December 2020.

Link to Previous Release (December 2020)

IMPORTANT


This data is for informational purposes and must be field verified prior to being used on a project.

Please direct questions to:

Suzie Swim, WFRC
sswim@wfrc.org

Tim Hereth, MAG
thereth@mountainland.org

Stephanie Tomlin, UDOT
satomlin@utah.gov

DOWNLOADS


To download the datasets, visit the following pages in the WFRC Data Portal:

Volumes

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/utah-statewide-traffic-volume-historic-and-forecast

Population

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/population-projections-taz

Households

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/household-projections-taz

Typical Employment

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/typical-jobs-projections-taz

Retail Employment

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/retail-jobs-projections-taz

Industrial Employment

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/industrial-jobs-projections-taz

Office Employment

https://data.wfrc.org/datasets/office-jobs-projections-taz
